title: Infinite Replay: I Fix Bugs In A Horror Game
alternative_title: Wu Xian Hui Dang: Wo Zai Jingsong Youxi Zuo bug; Wú Xiàn Huí Dàng: Wǒ Zài Jīngsǒng Yóuxì Zuò bug; 无线回档：我在惊悚游戏做bug
status: Wu Xian Hui Dang: Wo Zai Jingsong Youxi Zuo bug; Wú Xiàn Huí Dàng: Wǒ Zài Jīngsǒng Yóuxì Zuò bug; 无线回档：我在惊悚游戏做bug
description:
Description :
        Infinite Replay: I Fix Bugs in a Horror Game, Wu Xian H** Dang: Wo Zai Jingsong Youxi Zuo bug, W Xin Hu Dng: W Zi Jngsng Yux Zu bug, bug at manhua websiteDouble male protagonists + infinite flow + infinite replay + thick gold fingers + cool story (slightly scared to enter with caution) Qin Chi, an ordinary office worker, wakes up and finds himself involved in a horror game! The boss of the level, Beavis, calls him dear. If you don't kiss, hug and lift him up, you will die. After countless replays of death This is a pure story of being forced to accept the boss's pampering and having to cheat in order to survive.Recommend for you !
